7.14  skies.inc, stars.inc

These files contain some predefined skies for you to use in your scenes.

skies.inc:
There are textures and pigment definitions in this file. All pigment definitions start with "P_", all sky_spheres start with "S_", all textures start with "T_", and all objects start with "O_".

stars.inc:
This file contains predefined starfield textures. The starfields become denser and more colorful with the number, with Starfield6 being the densest and most colorful.

In 'skies.inc, stars.inc' ...

7.14.2  stars.inc
